name: Dragonborn
origin: Tens of thousands of years ago, the Dragonborn migrated from Argonnessen along with other dragons to guard Haka'torvhak that seals away an ancient Overlord.
summary: Dragonborn are very focused on their clan and honor. They strive to be self-sufficient and value skill and self-improvement.
The Dragonborn have had little interactions with other non-scale humanoids up until recently and mostly ignore them
They still reside in Q'Barra and guard the Overlords tombs from the Lords of Dust
characteristics: Dragonborn look very much like humanoid dragons without wings or tails. They usually stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and around 300 pounds.
A Dragonborn's scales and breath are dependent upon his/her dragon kin
prompts: What led you to leave Q'Barra?
Are you motivated to challenge the Lords of Dust, by wonderlust, or as a mercenary in the Last War?
